title: FNC Contributor Andrew McCarthy on Barr/Durham Investigation: It’s A Completely Legitimate Justice Department Investigation
text:
Right after House Speaker Nancy Pelosi announced an impeachment inquiry into President Donald Trump's interactions with Ukraine, Connecticut's U.S. Attorney, John Durham, boarded a plane to Italy with U.S. Attorney General William Barr. Durham's trip to Rome last month was part of his job of "investigating the investigators," to look into the origins of former Special Counsel Robert Mueller's probe, which Trump alleges are corrupt.

Andrew McCarthy, Fox News Contributor, Former Assistant U.S. Attorney For Southern District Of NY, Author Of The New Book "Ball Of Collusion: The Plot To Rig An Election And Destroy A Presidency" says this investigation is completely legit and his friends are on the other side will need to come to terms with it just like he had to with the Mueller Investigation.

Watch Below:
